No chargeable collusion conspiracy is significant.

html: On this day in 1933, FDR appointed Frances Perkins to serve as Secretary of Labor, making her the first woman to serve in the Cabinet. Under her leadership she helped create Social Security, establish a 40-hour work week, and require overtime pay.

Passenger vehicles & trucks account for 83% of greenhouse gas emissions.

Improve vehicle efficiency
Switch to fuel w/ less carbon
Reduce vehicle miles traveled
Fight Trump Admin's attacks on fuel economy standards
#ActOnClimate

html: Exactly one year ago, to the minute at around 7am, I sent two kids to school. Only my son Jesse came home. Jaime was murdered in school. I am forever haunted by my memory of that morning, rushing my kids out the door rather than getting one last minute. Did I say I love you?pic.twitter.com/s2IQHvDIcU

html: More than half of African American workers are paid less than $15, and women workers account for almost 55% of low wage workers. We need to #RaiseTheWage as a matter of fairness and equality.
text: More than half of African American workers are paid less than $15, and women workers account for almost 55% of low wage workers. We need to #RaiseTheWage as a matter of fairness and equality.

html: Hardworking men and women deserve to be able to afford their basic needs and take care of their families. Let’s honor our workers and #RaiseTheWage today! #FightFor15pic.twitter.com/4RLL6suo0L
text: Hardworking men and women deserve to be able to afford their basic needs and take care of their families. Let’s honor our workers and #RaiseTheWage today! #FightFor15pic.twitter.com/4RLL6suo0L

html: As a former small business owner, I have seen the benefits of investing in our workers. To those who say the minimum wage is too high, we say no—the problem with the minimum wage is that it is too LOW. #RaiseTheWage #FightFor15
text: As a former small business owner, I have seen the benefits of investing in our workers. To those who say the minimum wage is too high, we say no—the problem with the minimum wage is that it is too LOW. #RaiseTheWage #FightFor15

html: The federal minimum wage is not a living wage, and it is contributing to our terrible inequality. There is nowhere in America that a full-time worker earning $7.25 an hour can afford the basics. #FightFor15 #RaiseTheWagepic.twitter.com/RP58aIeTxK
text: The federal minimum wage is not a living wage, and it is contributing to our terrible inequality. There is nowhere in America that a full-time worker earning $7.25 an hour can afford the basics. #FightFor15 #RaiseTheWagepic.twitter.com/RP58aIeTxK

html: America’s infrastructure was once the envy of the world, but today it is losing its battle against time, growth, and #climatechange. We need to take bold, new & innovative approaches to tackling these issues head-on. #TheCostOfInaction
text: America’s infrastructure was once the envy of the world, but today it is losing its battle against time, growth, and #climatechange. We need to take bold, new & innovative approaches to tackling these issues head-on. #TheCostOfInaction

html: We have the largest, busiest & most complex aviation system in the world. Annually it supports more than a billion passengers & $1 trillion in economic activity. #TheCostOfInaction opens us up to new safety risks. As a member of @transportdems I'm working to make it safer.
text: We have the largest, busiest & most complex aviation system in the world. Annually it supports more than a billion passengers & $1 trillion in economic activity. #TheCostOfInaction opens us up to new safety risks. As a member of @transportdems I'm working to make it safer.

html: In our district and the larger San Francisco metro area, super commutes have more than doubled since 2005. We need smart investments in our transportation systems to more efficiently move people and goods. #TheCostOfInaction
text: In our district and the larger San Francisco metro area, super commutes have more than doubled since 2005. We need smart investments in our transportation systems to more efficiently move people and goods. #TheCostOfInaction

html: In 2017, congestion, directly and indirectly, cost drivers an average of $1,445. Investing in our infrastructure benefits everyone and that’s exactly why we’re taking action. #TheCostOfInaction @TransportDems
text: In 2017, congestion, directly and indirectly, cost drivers an average of $1,445. Investing in our infrastructure benefits everyone and that’s exactly why we’re taking action. #TheCostOfInaction @TransportDems

html: He was held in ICE detention for six months in our district, and his case is still in process. Akelo is an example of the negative impacts the Trump Administration’s immigration policies have on people who come to our country legally to seek asylum.

html: Akelo currently works as a service coordinator at a mental health facility in California. In 2016, after his mother and uncle were brutally murdered, Akelo arrived in the U.S. legally via San Francisco, where he sought asylum.

Zero.

html: The context surrounding Don McGahn’s announced departure is troubling. As @CillizzaCNN writes: “The man who single-handedly kept Trump from firing Mueller is now leaving the White House, 11 days after the extent of his cooperation with that same special counsel was made public.”
